text: [CCL] Update: Train services are running normally now.
[CCL Update]Train Service are progressively recovering. Free Regular Bus service available till 10.30am.
[CCL Update] Train Service are progressively recovering. Free Regular Bus service available till 10.30am.

[CCL Update] Pls add 30mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to
  #BuonaVista due to train fault. Free Regular bus available.

[CCL Update] Pls add 30mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to

[CCL] UPDATE: Free regular bus services available between #PayaLebar and #BuonaVista.

[CCL] Pls add 15mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to

[CCL] UPDATE: The security exercise at #Stadium MRT Station has ended. We would like to thank commuters for their patience.
[CCL]: SMRT will be conducting a security exercise at #Stadium MRT Station from 11am to 8.30pm today. For more info: http://bit.ly/2lRgWZG
CCL: CLEARED: Train Services between #Bishan and #HarbourFront are now operating normally.
CCL: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time between #bishan and #HarbourFront in both directions due to signal fault.

[CCL] UPDATE: Free regular bus services are available between #PayaLebar and

[CCL]: Due to a Signal fault between #Farrer Road and # Buona Vista .Pls add 20mins train travel time between #Buona Vista and HarbourFornt on both bounds.
[CCL]: Due to a signal  fault trains are moving slower between #BotanicGardens and #HawParVilla.  We are investigating the fault.
[CCL]CLEARED: Free regular bus services have ceased.
[CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared but trains and stations are crowded. Due to congestion, pls add 5mins travel time towards #HarbourFront. Free regular bus service still available.
[NSL] UPDATE:Commuters travelling from the North towards town can take other train lines - CCL at #Bishan or transfer to EWL at #JurongEast.
[CCL] UPDATE: Normal train service resumed towards #HarbourFront. Free regular bus services still available till 11pm.
[CCL] UPDATE: Train service is progressively recovering.
[CCL] UPDATE: Free regular bus services are available from #Caldecott to #HarbourFront.
